result.execSummary:
The defendant Anthony J Johnson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

  Pay DOC Supervision fees.

  Def to undergo Domestic Abuse Assessment and follow through with any recommendations.

Credit for 3 days if probation revoked.

Discussion of beer in the house.

20 hours Community Service as sanction - one time obligation - due 2/15/16

Def w/atty O'Neill
  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights
Ct1&2: Def pleads guilty
CRT: sentence withheld 18 months probation concurrent w/14CF813 & on each count concurrent w/same cond also concurrent w/cond: AODA & comply, Dom Abuse assess & comply, no alcohol or CS w/random testing, 30 hours CS, pay CC + DOC Supervision fees, credit for 3 days if probation revoked.
RH: 1/12 @ 4
Amended
PO Lorrie Pfaff

From: Atty O'Neill Re: req plea hearing for 10/21 be changed to bond mod req
SLH: ok, but will set for trial

1:35 PM - (w/ 14CF813) - Def in court w/Atty Sean William O'Neill.  Rukmini Vasupuram appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
O'Neill: we have an agmt but I have a large sentencing today and haven't gotten the paperwork together. 
PLEA/SENT: 10/23 @ 2:15 - depending on the FFH
Lifted w/MH

No One present - Michelle H.  wants to lift no contact
Court:  DENIED

Cancellation req by COC - def in CRT
Canceled in Visions: 7-31-15
Plea/sentencing hearing at 09-17-2015 09:00 am

Consent & Order for Sub of Atty for Atty Sean O'Neill in place of Atty Eric Sanford - signed by SLH
(no sase was sent - not mailed to Atty O'Neill)

State by Suleski /  Def w/ Atty Sean O'Neill
CRT:  I was given a Consent & Order for Sub of Counsel in 15CF377 but don't see anything in 14CF813
O'Neill:  yes, there should be one in both - as to warrant - def did post on 6-12-15 but then had positive alcohol test on 2 dates - client made wrong decision to abscond - he has employment, no other violations - req another date for Status than 8-6-15
CRT:  This has been a problematic bond - def was placed on bond monitoring on 1-23-15, then there were GPS issues, he had removed bracelet & no longer staying in the residence, an OTD was signed - def was arrested on 6-10-15 on new charges as well as the OTD.  On the 11th of June bond was posted - he was released again to JSS & had positive test on 6-24-15 & another positive on 6-28-15 & OTD was again issued.  Apparently this is the first appearance since then - CRT is sensitive to employment but there must be consequences.  CRT will Forfeit $500 of the 1000 cash bond posted - CRT will reinstate the remaining $500 cash bond & then add as a requirement of bond:  curfew 10pm to 6am to be enforced by EM except for employment.
Def:  I usually go to work @ 6am
CRT:  OK - Curfew is from 10pm to 5:30am  - any other violations you can expect the remainder of bond to be forfeited & a much more substantial bond enforced
CRT:  Quash warrant - Set for Plea in 30 days & if not resolved at that time, will place on trial calendar
of Bail/Bond Forfeiture - mailed to def / cc:  Def Atty Sanford & DA's office
COMPAS

Per SLH:  Yes
